title: Understanding Market Equilibrium
description: Explore how supply and demand curves interact to reach equilibrium and how government interventions can affect competitive markets.

title: Deriving and Analyzing Demand Curves
description: Learn the process of deriving demand curves and evaluating changes in consumer welfare as a result of price alterations.

title: Production Functions and Firm Behavior
description: Discover how production functions, cost curves, and supply curves define the behavior and decisions of firms in various market settings.
